node.name: With My Tribe
node.description: They understand you, they resonate with you, and they share similar values and beliefs. They are your soul tribe.

node.name: Star Jasmine + Santal
node.scent_description:
Bergamot, citrus, and lavender offer radiant and elegant components harmonize with pleasant, sultry, sandalwood, cedarwood, and amber.

Scent Notes
TOP: Bergamot + Citrus + Lavandin 
MIDDLE: Jasmine + Lily + Rose
BASE: Amber + Cedarwood + Sandalwood
node.description:

MIDDLE: Jasmine + Lily + Rose\
BASE: Amber + Cedarwood + Sandalwood

node.name: Cashmere + Vanilla
node.scent_description:
A sexy and inviting vanilla elevated by woody cashmere and sweet amber is made complete with fruity citrus notes.

Scent Notes
TOP: Pear + Bergamot + Peach Blossom 
MIDDLE: Warm Amber + Jasmine + Cashmere 
BASE: Musk + Sheer Vanilla + Sandalwood
node.description:

node.name: Pink Peony + Nectarine
node.scent_description:
Lush layers of citrus and playful pink peonies meet refined spices and cedar for a vivid, fruity floral scent with many polished layers.

Scent Notes
TOP: Mandarin + Grapefruit + Nectarine 
MIDDLE: Rose + Peony + Pink Pepper 
BASE: Sandalwood + Cedar + Musk
node.description:

###### Scent Notes

MIDDLE: Rose + Peony + Pink Pepper \
BASE: Sandalwood + Cedar + Musk

node.name: Honey + Bourbon
node.scent_description:
This elevated scent from honey and rich bourbon, coupled with faint sweetened, spicy notes, settles into a refreshing cocktail twist. 

Scent Notes
TOP: Orange Marmalade + Tamarind + Honey  
MIDDLE: Bourbon + Coumarin + Clove 
BASE: Brown Sugar + Tobacco
node.description:

node.name: Sage + Lavender
node.scent_description:
Relaxing and purifying sage blended with soul-soothing lavender carried with warm and earthy tones create a space in tranquility. 

Scent Notes
TOP: Lavender + Juniper Water
MIDDLE: Cardamon + Sage + Davana
BASE: Musk + White Woods + Beach Wood

node.name: Apple Rind + Cinnamon
node.scent_description:
A heavenly combination of crisp fruit, buttery crust, and just the right amount of sweetness gives us a new apple dutch pumpkin pie. 

Scent Notes
TOP: Red Apple + Pear
MIDDLE: Pumpkin Spice + Clove + Pie Crust
BASE: Brown Sugar + Vanilla Bean
node.description:
A heavenly combination of crisp fruit, buttery crust, and just the right amount of sweetness gives us a new apple dutch pumpkin pie. 
###### Scent Notes
TOP: Red Apple + Pear \
MIDDLE: Pumpkin Spice + Clove + Pie Crust \
BASE: Brown Sugar + Vanilla Bean

node.name: Smoked Cedar + Leather
node.scent_description:
This exciting, fiery fragrance teleports us to a posh cigar club where we enjoy leather accents and various scents while curled by the fireplace.

Scent Notes
TOP: Cumin + Cedar Leaf + Apple
MIDDLE: Oregano + Anise + Cannabis  
BASW: Spice + Warm Leather + Smoke

node.name: Roasted Chestnuts + Rum
node.scent_description:
This fragrance, brimming with spirits yet a classy aroma reminiscent of enjoying a Between The Sheets cocktail this holiday for a twist.

Scent Notes
TOP: Cognac + Dark Rum + Lemon Zest 
MIDDLE: Roasted Chestnuts + Maple + Cedar 
BASE: Tonka Bean + Charred Vanilla + Oakmoss

node.name: Citronella
node.scent_description: As an essential oil, this fragrant grass got its name from the French word meaning “lemon balm” due to its floral, citrus-like aroma and known as a natural insect repellant.
node.description: As an essential oil, this fragrant grass got its name from the French word meaning “lemon balm” due to its floral, citrus-like aroma and known as a natural insect repellant.

node.name: Citronella + Lavender
node.scent_description: As an essential oil, both Citronella and Lavender have a floral, citrus-like aroma that acts as a natural insect repellant. Lavender also had a calming component to the integrity of the blend.
node.description: As an essential oil, both Citronella and Lavender have a floral, citrus-like aroma that acts as a natural insect repellant. Lavender also had a calming component to the integrity of the blend.

node.name: Citronella + Lavender + Lemongrass
node.scent_description: As an essential oil, both Citronella and Lavender have a floral, citrus-like aroma that acts as a natural insect repellant. And Lavender and Lemongrass complete the full blend with a stress-relieving component.

node.name: Massage
node.scent_description: Hand poured massage candles made with skin-softening shea butter, apricot, sweet almond, jojoba, and soybean oils, blended with roses, peony, and bergamot essential oils.
node.description: Hand poured massage candles made with skin-softening shea butter, apricot, sweet almond, jojoba, and soybean oils, blended with roses, peony, and bergamot essential oils.

node.accordion_subtitle: These burning rules will extend the life of your candle.
node.accordion_body:
###### (1)Trim the wick
Trimming the wick to about a ¼ inch allows for a better clean burn and doesn’t lead to the flames blackening the glass of your jar.
###### (2)Allow for a good first burn
The first burn of the candle is the most important. In the first burn, allow for the melted wax pool to reach the edge of the jar; otherwise, tunneling will occur. Lastly, keep burning candles away from AC vents and fans because the draft will not allow the candle to burn evenly and can become hazardous.
###### (3)Don’t burn too much
Do not burn for more than 2-4 hours (depending on the size of candle) every 24 hours is the rule of thumb when burning your candle.
###### (4)Keep the candle clean
Try to avoid letting the candle jar get dirty or this will affect the burn. Avoid using cleaning products because this could interact with the fragrance oils and lead to a bad smelling candle.
node.body:
###### (1)Trim the wick
Trimming the wick to about a ¼ inch allows for a better clean burn and doesn’t lead to the flames blackening the glass of your jar.
###### (2)Allow for a good first burn
The first burn of the candle is the most important. In the first burn, allow for the melted wax pool to reach the edge of the jar; otherwise, tunneling will occur. Lastly, keep burning candles away from AC vents and fans because the draft will not allow the candle to burn evenly and can become hazardous.
###### (3)Don’t burn too much
Do not burn for more than 2-4 hours (depending on the size of candle) every 24 hours is the rule of thumb when burning your candle.
###### (4)Keep the candle clean
Try to avoid letting the candle jar get dirty or this will affect the burn. Avoid using cleaning products because this could interact with the fragrance oils and lead to a bad smelling candle.

node.accordion_body:
###### (1) Don’t walk away
Never leave a burning candle unattended. Make sure that candle is completely out and the wick ember us no longer glowing before leaving the room.
###### (2) Secure the area
Never burn a candle on or near anything that might catch fire. Keep burning candles away from furniture, drapes, bedding, carpets, books, paper, and flammable decorations. Keep your hair and loose clothing away from the flame.
###### (3) Keep from kids & pets
Make sure children and pets cannot reach burning candles. Do not place lit candles where they can be knocked over by children, pets, or anyone else.
###### (4) Avoid drafts and vents
Avoid drafts, vents, or air currents. This will help prevent rapid or uneven burn, shooting, and excessive dripping.
###### (5) Don’t touch or move
Never touch or move a candle while it is burning or while the wax is liquefied.
###### (6) Keep candle 3” apart
Place burning candles at least three inches apart from one another. This is to make sure they don’t melt one another, or create their own drafts that will cause the candles to burn improperly. Keep your candles happy so you can stay happy as well!
node.body:
###### (1) Don’t walk away
Never leave a burning candle unattended. Make sure that candle is completely out and the wick ember us no longer glowing before leaving the room.
###### (2) Secure the area
Never burn a candle on or near anything that might catch fire. Keep burning candles away from furniture, drapes, bedding, carpets, books, paper, and flammable decorations. Keep your hair and loose clothing away from the flame.
###### (3) Keep from kids & pets
Make sure children and pets cannot reach burning candles. Do not place lit candles where they can be knocked over by children, pets, or anyone else.
###### (4) Avoid drafts and vents
Avoid drafts, vents, or air currents. This will help prevent rapid or uneven burn, shooting, and excessive dripping.
###### (5) Don’t touch or move
Never touch or move a candle while it is burning or while the wax is liquefied.
###### (6) Keep candle 3” apart
Place burning candles at least three inches apart from one another. This is to make sure they don’t melt one another, or create their own drafts that will cause the candles to burn improperly. Keep your candles happy so you can stay happy as well!

node.accordion_body:
##### Candle Making
Individually hand poured makes it each candle special with a processing time of 48-72 hours before being shipped to its new home.
##### Domestic Shipping
Candles will ship via the following options: standard, standard ground, and expedited shipping. At the time of checkout, you will select your shipment choice available along with rates and arrival time desired. Once your candle has been picked up and scanned for shipment, you will receive a shipping notification with tracking information.
##### International Shipping
At this time, we are only able to ship domestically throughout the U.S. International shipping is temporary, and we look forward to having this option soon for your candles.
##### Refunds/Exchanges/Lost/Stoten
All of our candles are carefully inspected before they are packaged for shipping. Due to the products' sensitivity, used candles cannot be returned or refunded. Nevertheless, we will replace or refund products damaged during shipment if you submit photo proof within 7 days of delivery. For lost, stolen, or miss-delivered packages tillallhours Candle Co. cannot be held accountable but can confirm we ship with the most reliable carriers that include USPS, FedEx, and UPS. In ensuring the best possible experience with our company, please contact the carrier assigned to your order and see if they have any insight. If they are unable to assist after, tillallhours will help resolve this with an email to Support@tillallhours.com.
